author: protolambda
content:
Update on my eth2api bindings: implemented some go test things to consume example requests/responses as test-vectors, mock a Go API client, and test the bindings.
Plan is now to put some python together to do lots of different requests to a mainnet node with v1 spec API. (which itself could be a test for server API, if you compare output with earlier outputs).
And then all those request/responses can be test-vectors for the API client.
